text: @WhiteHouse @fema Except for the 60,000 deaths, the silence of Republican Senators is shameful. Seniors are the most vulnerable. The Whitehouse acting like the Pandemic didn't happen. Opening will tragically effect the elderly the most who are forgotten by this Whitehouse.  https://t.co/n0heysIAJ5
